title: Bonnell Aluminum Announces New Vice President of Sales and Marketing
text:
NEWNAN, Ga.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bonnell Aluminum, a subsidiary of Tredegar Corporation (NYSE:TG), is pleased to announce the appointment of Eric Yost to the position of Vice President of Sales and Marketing, effective July 1, 2018. Mr. Yost will be replacing Ira Endres, who, after 43 years of service, will be retiring from the Company.
Mr. Yost has been with Bonnell Aluminum for more than 20 years, serving most recently as Plant Manager of Bonnell’s automotive operations. Mr. Yost’s previous roles in the organization have included Manager of Continuous Improvement, North American Sales Manager, Plant Sales Manager, and Regional Sales Manager.
Brook Hamilton, President of Bonnell Aluminum, said, “We thought it was very important to identify a successor that would give our business and customers the best opportunity to continue the strong commercial legacy that was established and cultivated over the last 60 years. Eric’s demonstrated leadership and strong operational expertise will build upon Bonnell’s culture of sales excellence to help drive the Company’s growth forward.”
About Bonnell Aluminum
Bonnell Aluminum is a subsidiary of Tredegar Corporation (NYSE:TG). The Company and its operating divisions, AACOA and Futura Industries, are leading manufacturers of custom-fabricated and finished aluminum extrusions serving the building and construction, automotive and transportation, consumer durables, machinery and equipment, electrical and distribution markets. The Company has manufacturing facilities located in Newnan GA, Carthage TN, Niles MI, Elkhart IN, and Clearfield, UT. For additional information about us, please visit www.bonnellaluminum.com .
